title: Katie Price 'threatens to alert the police to ex Charles Drury for stealing'
text:

Katie Price has threatened to call the police on her ex toyboy Charles Drury.

It's claimed the former glamour model accused her former flame of stealing from her during their brief romantic relationship which he has denied.

Yet Charles has vehemently denied the claims he has taken anything from his ex-girlfriend and said he has not been called by the police.

A source revealed to The Sun Online : "Katie is completely paranoid that Charles has taken things from her throughout their relationship.

"She called Charles and threatened to ring the police.

"She's accusing him of stealing from her, but he is adamant he's done nothing of the sort."

A representative for Charles told us: "Charles has not stolen anything from Katie. He has also not had any contact from the police."

The Mirror has approached a representative for Katie Price and Charles Drury.

Katie has confirmed she's back on with Kris Boyson and her ex toyboy Charles hasn't made a secret of the fact he isn't happy about it.

This summer the former glamour model dumped Kris, 30, by text after she jetted off to Turkey with Charles.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

But now she's giving things another go with Kris, Charles has made what appears to be a savage dig about her on Instagram , saying she can't "change her stripes".

He wrote the cryptic post: "The tiger cannot change its stripes."

Katie however is looking forward to spending half term with her children.

Yet the star appeared to hint her son Junior wouldn't be joining them for the family get-together.

The mum-of-five talked about her excitement for the school break, but left the 14-year-old out.
description: Katie and Charles are at war since she returned to the arms of her ex Kris Boyson in recent weeks
